summary: The conversation is between a customer (speaker_0) and a relationship manager (speaker_1) from the Lendingclub platform. The customer had made an investment in the PTP (peer-to-peer) lending on the platform and is now following up on it.
questions_asked:
- Whether this is the customer's first time investment in PTP lending on the platform
- If the customer has any doubts or concerns about how PTP lending works
overall_sentiment: Positive. The customer seems to be a first-time investor in PTP lending, and the relationship manager is proactively addressing any potential concerns the customer might have.
